channel.title: Bible on Obed's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bible on Obed's Blog

item.title: Who has made man's mouth?
item.description: It has been a while that I promised I’d submit a daily bible treasure. This is a time for new resolutions and to make it happen. I’m planning to share some extracts from my daily bible reading. I trying my best to post something at least once a week. I wish that The Lord bless you with all this.

item.title: Introduccion a 'Un mensaje diario'
item.description: Este es un inicio de algo que quiero emprender. Un mensaje diario de lo que estoy aprendiendo al estar estudiando la palabra de Dios. El propósito es compartir lo que Dios me permite aprender cada día.
